comments: He is a really smart prof. Knows his material well. Excellent at explaining what is meant to be taught. You have to attend class as well as read the text to fully understand. Fair exam. I would recommend this prof to everyone.

Had him for Thermo in the summer.Good prof, explains things well, but his exams are killer! It\'s like there were things on the exam we didn\'t cover in class. Does NOT provide enough homework problems to cover the material taught in class. I think he\'s a swell guy, it might just be the material he\'s teaching. Just a terrible experience.

the prof. is real crap. it is a shame that the university hires such profs.....he diesnt even know how to teach. he comes up in class and says that he\'s not the kind of professor who teaches everything. personally it is a waste of money if you are taking class from him. he is the most useless and worthless professor i have seen in my entire life!!!
